meanings.definition: Attracting and holding interest or attention
meanings.sent1: The captivating story kept the children engaged during storytime.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a captivating plot that kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: The captivating magician made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: Her captivating smile lit up the room like a beacon of joy.
meanings.sent5: The captivating sunset painted the sky in a mesmerizing array of colors.

meanings.definition: Capable of capturing interest or attention
meanings.sent1: The captivating painting drew in viewers with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The new video game is captivating players with its immersive gameplay.
meanings.sent3: The captivating advertisement made everyone stop and take notice.
meanings.sent4: His captivating performance on stage left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The captivating melody of the song lingered in the minds of listeners long after it ended.
